arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Blackburn Rovers: Sinclair Armstrong pick of bunch after disappointing defeat
arts.sum: He looked to make a number of key passes forward from the midfield but couldn’t make any real impact. He struggled with the Rovers’ attack in the second half and was passed on a number of occasions on the right-hand side during a tough outing in the second period.

arts.ttl: 'Top draw' - John Eustace outlines what pleased him with Blackburn Rovers win
arts.sum: The head coach was delighted after a 3-0 home win over Bristol City

arts.ttl: Yuki Ohashi brace helps Blackburn to comfortable win over Bristol City
arts.sum: Lewis Travis was also on target for Rovers.

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers' unbeaten start continues as Ohashi heroics sink Bristol City
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers remain unbeaten after beating Bristol City 3-0 at Ewood Park

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers player ratings as Beck, Carter and Ohashi shine in dominant win

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Blackburn Rovers: Manning to run the changes after Derby defeat
arts.sum: Although the result last time out was far from the levels seen under Manning in the Ashton Gate hotseat, City had made a solid start to the Championship campaign. With City returning to league business, Manning described the stoppage in the season as having its pros and cons but ultimately was pleased to have two uninterrupted weeks of training with his new-look squad.

arts.ttl: 'I’m excited' - Bristol City legend relishing Robins reunion ahead of Blackburn Rovers contest - Bristol Live
arts.sum: Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community. Andi Weimann will face his former side for the first time this weekend as Bristol City make the long trip north to Blackburn Rovers.
